formalpara.title: Figure 4.
formalpara.para: Alternative splicing of unc-52. Diagram of alternative splicing of the unc-52 gene. Every combination of exon inclusion and skipping of exons 16, 17 and 18 has been detected. MEC-8 enhances the skipping of exons 17 and 18; isoforms promoted by MEC-8 are indicated in red (Lundquist et al., 1996).
